definitions.body: (q.v.), ´[[חֶבֶר הַקּ]]: (dwelling in N. Isr.), o( Keinai=ov Ju Jdg 4:11, Jdg 4:17, Jdg 4:17, Jdg 5:24 (against WMM Jen, who ref. ´[[ק]]: here to city Kîn near Megiddo, mentioned by Egypt., v. esp. Bu Now on Jdg 4:11); rd. prob. also ´[[חׂבָב הַקּ]]: Jdg 1:16 (for ´[[בְּנֵי ק]]:; so Bu GFM; LXX oi( ui(oi\ Ioqor tou= Keinai/on); elsewhere as

definitions.title: n. gent. coll.
definitions.body: ´[[הַקּ]]: settled among Amal., Nu 24:21 (JE; v. II. [[קַיִן]]

), 1Sa 15:6—= [[קֵינִי]] v:1Sa 15:6 (We Bu Kit [[קַיִן]], HPS [[הַקֵּינִי]]);—´[[הַקּ]]: also 1Sa 27:10, 1Sa 30:29 (B LXXL Kenez(e)I =[[קְנִזִּי]] A Khnel, Keinai=ov); Ge 15:19 (list of peoples; R); = [[הַקִּינִים]] 1Ch 2:55 (K (e)inai=oi), related to Rechabites.
